history.narrative: Law 19-289, the “Sign Regulation Authorization Amendment of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-819. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 29, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-656 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-289 became effective on Jan. 29, 2013.
